explains: n. 起床者；起义者；竖板；叛徒
wordGroup: marine riser 隔水管；海底取油管
early riser ◎早起者，(习惯于)早起来的人 , ◎机敏(或机警、精明)的人 , ◎早起的人 , ◎机敏的人；精明的人

sentences.en: When the rig sank, the riser broke near the top while remaining attached to the blowout preventer at the bottom.
sentences.cn: 当钻井平台下沉时，立管在顶部附近的地方断裂，同时另一端仍与底部的防喷器相连。

sentences.en: He was an early riser and he would be at the breakfast table at seven.
sentences.cn: 他习惯早起，七点钟就坐在桌前用早餐。

sentences.en: Do you believe that anyone can ditch their alarm clock and become a happy early riser?
sentences.cn: 你相信任何人都能把闹钟丢弃，并且变成一个快乐的早起者吗？
